tier.item: `The door is open (who knows who opened it).'
`The door is open (who knows who opened it).'
The door is open (who knows who opened it).
`A cow and goat are butting (each other).'
`A cow and goat are butting (each other).'
A cow and goat are butting (each other).
We are talking to each other.

tier.item: `The goat butted the fence and broke it.' (ex. & tr. Chhangte 1993: 143)
`The goat butted the fence and broke it.' (ex. & tr. Chhangte 1993: 143)
The goat butted the fence and broke it.
